named-query.name: BC_READ_MULTISHIP_OPTIONS_BY_ORDER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT mso FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.OrderMultishipOption mso WHERE mso.order.id = :orderId

named-query.name: BC_READ_MULTISHIP_OPTIONS_BY_ORDER_ITEM_ID
named-query.query: SELECT mso FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.OrderMultishipOption mso WHERE mso.orderItem.id = :orderItemId
